data.title: How to access GNOME header in Qt project
data.meta_description: I'm working on developing a Qt/C++ application for Linux distros which has a module which deals with icon overlays. I need icon overlays exactly like in svn or dropbox. First I'm starting with GNOME
data.text:
I'm working on developing a Qt/C++ application for Linux distros which has a module which deals with icon overlays. I need icon overlays exactly like in svn or dropbox. First I'm starting with GNOME environment.

I found that I need to access APIs provided by nautilus, for example for icon overlay, I need to use the API - nautilus_file_info_add_emblem() which is part of nautilus-file-info

Link - https://developer.gnome.org/libnautilus-extension/stable/libnautilus-extension-nautilus-file-info.html

How do I access the nautilus file managers' headers in my Qt/C++ project ?

Thank you.
